docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to the family wiki for the Epics!

Just setting this up, so not much here. At the very least, we'll have a Recipes section to refer to. I'd also like to set up a place for our family stories and geneology.

docs.title: Recipes
docs.text:
Over time, our family recipes have occupied many media: scattered cookbooks, notecards, individual sheets, browser bookmarks, a Discord thread...

I want the recipes to be easy to find, hard to lose, and easy to search. Discord is NOT very searchable or very durable: someday they'll cancel our accounts, and we'll lost everything.

This is a top level page for all our family recipes.

docs.title: Ingredients
docs.text:
• 1 pkg (10 oz) frozen chopped spinach
  • 1 egg
  • 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs
  • 1 cup Parmesan cheese

These are the original amounts from the note card. This recipe is cooking, not baking: the amounts can be varied wildly and still have good results. Adding more bread crumbs makes for a crispier patty; more cheese makes for a chewier one.

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
• Cook and draing the spinach (if you like; we skip this step all the time)
  • Mix all ingredients well
  • Scoop out around 1/3 cup at a time and shape into patties
  • Flatter patties will be crispier
  • Thicker patties will be chewier
  • Fry in oil (no specific time; some like more sear than others)
  • Serve on hamburger buns
